Let's start with the following problem statement:

> We want to evolve an autonomous wheeled mobile robot (WMR) to maximize the distance traveled in a fixed amount of time.


```{ojs}
import { Player } from '../_lib/Player/dist/player.js';
import { WMR2D } from  '../_lib/WMR2D/dist/wmr2d.js';

uiTimeEnd = 16.0;
uiTimeStep = 0.1;

function updateWMR1( time ) {

  wmr1.updatePositionClosedForm( time );
  wmr1.render( true );

}

wmr1 = new WMR2D( 'wmr-canvas1' );

player1 = new Player( uiTimeEnd, uiTimeStep, updateWMR1 );
player1.create();
```

```{=html}
<div>
    <canvas id="wmr-canvas1"></canvas>
</div>
```


```{ojs}
function updateWMR2( time ) {

  wmr2.updatePositionClosedForm( time );
  wmr2.render( true );

}

wmr2 = new WMR2D( 'wmr-canvas2', { addWall: true } );

player2 = new Player( uiTimeEnd, uiTimeStep, updateWMR2 );
player2.create();
```



```{=html}
<div>
    <canvas id="wmr-canvas2"></canvas>
</div>
```
